info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 7 at 8:20PM CDT by NWS New Orleans LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Mississippi...
Tangipahoa River Near Robert affecting Tangipahoa Parish.
Bogue Chitto River Near Tylertown affecting Pike and Walthall Counties.
Bogue Chitto River Near Bush affecting St. Tammany Parish.
Pearl River Near Bogalusa affecting Washington and Pearl River Counties.
Pearl River Near Pearl River affecting Pearl River, Hancock and St. Tammany Counties.
East Hobolochitto Creek Near Caesar affecting Pearl River County.
For the Tangipahoa River...including Robert...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Bogue Chitto River...including Tylertown, Bush...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Lower Pearl River...including Bogalusa, Pearl River...Minor flooding is forecast. For the East Hobolochitto Creek...including Caesar...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Pearl River near Bogalusa.
* WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Woodlands and crop acreage along the river will be flooded. The Bogue Chitto Wildlife Management area will be inundated with water in recreational camps and over access roads.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 20.5 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations.
The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 1230 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
